page.title: 18Health con't
page.content: failure have also appeared in my time and many others also. {Diet,Contraception_Unmarried { Mothers} In diet matters at last there seems to be some sign of an awakening to the fact of life_perhaps the day of the 'fat boy' are at last numbered. In contraception here there have been great advances,with legalised abortion as a last resort.One can say unwanted babies are now the result of stupidity,because the knowlage is there in the asking in all sorts of media.I would wish however that the profession of unmarried mothers were not so popular among the young.It appears to be regarded as both respectable and desirable.
